topic.title: Number of Pressure Ulcers Observation (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: This template represents the number of pressure ulcers observed at a particular stage.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-14707, CONF:1198-14708, CONF:1198-32604 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14767)/@code="2264892003" Number of pressure ulcers (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1198-14768, CONF:1198-32164)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14718)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:1198-14719)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation such that it (CONF:1198-14720)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-14721)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1198-14722)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-31930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Pressure Ulcer Stage 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.35 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1198-14725)
SHALL conform to Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14705, R2.1=CONF:1198-14705)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14706, R2.1=CONF:1198-14706)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14709, R2.1=CONF:1198-14709)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14767)/@code="2264892003" Number of pressure ulcers (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1198-14768, CONF:1198-32164)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14714, R2.1=CONF:1198-14714)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14714, R2.1=CONF:1198-19108)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14715, R2.1=CONF:1198-14715)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:14771, R2.1=CONF:1198-14771)

MAY contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:14717, R2.1=CONF:1198-14717)
Conforms to Author from CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1198-14718)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:1198-14719)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation such that it (CONF:1198-14720)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-14721)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1198-14722)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1198-31930)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Pressure Ulcer Stage 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.35 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1198-14725)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1486642853"/> <code code="2264892003" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="number of pressure ulcers"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1430241517"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14707, CONF:14708 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.76"
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14705, R2.1=CONF:1198-14705)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14706, R2.1=CONF:1198-14706)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14709, R2.1=CONF:1198-14709)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14767)/@code="2264892003" number of pressure ulcers (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:14768)

Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14714, R2.1=CONF:1198-14714)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14714, R2.1=CONF:1198-19108)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14715, R2.1=CONF:1198-14715)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:14771, R2.1=CONF:1198-14771)
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation MAY contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:14717, R2.1=CONF:1198-14717) Conforms to Author from CDA
Consol Number Of Pressure Ulcers Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship, where its type is Entry Relationship (CONF:14718)
SHALL conform to CDA Entry Relationship
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:14719)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Observation (CONF:14720)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14721)
Consol Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14722)
Consol Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:14725), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Pressure Ulcer Stage 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.35 STATIC 2014-09-01
